website_summaries.verdict: Known for their custom fit and high level of durability, simplehuman makes these impressive trash bags for their products.
pros: Bags are strong enough to stand up to even sharp pieces of trash or recyclables
Bags are perfectly tailored to fit simplehuman models that accommodate code “R” bags
Snug fit ensures no slippage and easy installation
cons: These bags only fit simplehuman models

customer_reviews.title: High quality but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bags never leak, don't often tear, sometimes separate on corners of items, usually stretch & hold. They don't underperform or disappoint in any way. The only issues are that the liners seem overpriced, quality considered, and the company does their best to avoid enabling you to buy 3rd party liners (liters instead of gallons, not listing dimensions, giving inexact capacity, etc) Downside is that people with non-simplehuman trash cans & waste baskets refrain from buying better-fitting simplehuman liners. I've included measurements for A, R, D, E, G and H liners in the pics (height/length & width) plus a soda can for scale
customer_reviews.author: Alyna Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dirty diapers, size is sufficient to last till trash days.  The additional cost for custom fit bags is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was a little salty initially that I was basically paying for "proprietary" (custom fit) trash bags, but these fit great and are pretty durable, so I've made my peace. We use these in a 10L can for dirty diapers, and the size is just right to last till trash days twice a week, so I feel like I'm getting the most of each bag. Dirty diapers are shocking (and disgustingly) heavy, and these have proven durable and leakproof. Used to buy 20 count packs locally from a place that offers 20% coupons regularly, but found that the 60 count box on Amazon was cheaper even after the coupons.
customer_reviews.author: ffej101

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful garbage bags! I use to buy regular strong garbage bags and then I purchased a simple human garbage can and I tried the Code J garbage bags, and loved them. I went back to regular trash bags and immediately started missing the custom J garbage bags, the handles stay clean, they don’t break/rip under weight, the bags are durable never get holes in bags/leaks, and my trash can looks very neat without the garbage bag showing at all from outside! Very good quality bags.
customer_reviews.author: Zarin Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Beware. This is ONE overpriced pack
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the review, was hoping it was a one-off or had been corrected...this is literally ONE 20 count bag, HUGE rip off. This is not a comment on the product itself but rather a grossly overpriced and misleading listing. A typically “refill” pack is three 20 count bags, for which, the listed price would be more appropriate. Buy somewhere else!!!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought the SH trash can from Home Despot, but oddly enough they don't carry the bags. At about a quarter per bag, these are a tiny bit pricey...however they fit the can very snugly (standard bin liners don't) and they are the thickest, most sturdy bin liners I've ever used. You can stuff them full and they won't tear or split. Since I'm single, this bag of 100 liners will probably last me about a year. I'm happy to pay about $25 a year for quality liners!
customer_reviews.author: Roma Cranberry

customer_reviews.title: Simplehuman trash can replacement bags
customer_reviews.text: Upon moving to our new home, we decided to use the local recycling company so I purchased the Simplehuman double trash can. These bags are specifically designed to fit the unit and work great. They install in the back of the unit and you pull one out when it is time to change the bag. Holds a lot more than I expected it to and is very strong. So I am using fewer bags than I expected. Great price/great value! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Trash Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I’d review trash bags... but I bought this garbage can and Bed Bath Beyond, and these bags are very thick and fit perfectly. I bought a huge order of them three years ago and finally ran out. They’ve never broken or torn. I thought the garbage can would have broken by now but it’s still going strong. I love how you can put the bags inside the trash can and pull them out each time you take out the trash. That’s a very cool feature. So, yes, using these with the Simple Human cans is better than using generic bags. Happy Housekeeping!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: More than just a trash bag
customer_reviews.text: Buying a trash can that utilizes cumstom fit liners was one of the best purchases I’ve ever made. These liners cost a few more cents than regular liners but the difference is worth every penny. Very durable, I’ve never had one leak or tear. A little tight to install but certainly not problematic. My family and I pack these bad boys to the limit and they always perform well. I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't planning to buy these.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Simple Human trash can and a sample of the bags came with it. They are a bit more expensive, so I used them up and started back to my old standard tall kitchen bags. After a few weeks, I decided that I really liked the quality of the Simple Human bags, the fact that they are an exact fit to the trash can and they slide out beautifully just makes this chore a little easier. Maybe I am spoiled, but life already has it's share of little hassles, and I decided that emptying my trash can was not going to be one of them. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: Literally every bag rips
customer_reviews.text: Literally every bag rips. I have both the size D and the size G and the same goes for both. I have been using them for over a month now, and have not had even one bag not tear somewhere. They’re not over stuffed, they’re actually understuffed. Excuse the irony, but these are overpriced garbage.
customer_reviews.author: OldtoysNewplastic

customer_reviews.title: Trash can game on point
customer_reviews.text: There are few things that bring joy like a well fitting trashcan liner. These babies are the real deal. We absolutely love our simplehuman trashcan and want to show it love by using the approved liner. We could step down and use a normal liner but how would that make our trashcan feel?!? Would it intentionally tear the inferior liner during extraction?!? We're not going to take that risk, because we're not into exploding trash can liners that will leave our kitchen floor a mess. Trashcan liner motto: use the right trashcan liner, period!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Do you even know what a trash bag IS?
customer_reviews.text: You think you've been handling waste well in your home for all this time. But I can assure you, after years of being disgruntled and inconvenienced by the inconsistency and frustration that is a "kitchen garbage can", 'twas a truly blessed moment when my sister brought home the simplehuman trash receptacle. The bags are pricey, sure. But you have not lived until you have used these bags with a simplehuman waste bin. I used to believe that I could never have a pleasant experience with my garbage. But now, I trashCAN.
customer_reviews.author: Alice McCall

customer_reviews.title: regular bags do the job much cheaper
customer_reviews.text: The simplehuman wastebasket has a slot specially designed for these. i tend to use the simplehuman brand at times of year when i need more convenience than usual - times when i do a lot of extra cooking and gift wrapping: back to school timeframe, thanksgiving to new year's, easter to mother's day. Other times of year i use regular bags.
customer_reviews.author: Plummy

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced trash bags that fit their trashcans perfectly
customer_reviews.text: They're overpriced trashbags sized exactly to fit the simplehuman products. They're not special in any other sense. They are not super durable, and have a tendency to rip when paper items are in the bags, or sharp things (duh). They are blue color, I guess to let you know hey this is recycling. They fit the simple human trash cans perfectly. But, they are overpriced trash bags and a seeming luxury item due to their ridiculous packaging. It looks good but it is unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I fought against using these with my simple human can. But once I received a new one and it came with some samples of the bags, I couldn't imagine using anything else again. They fit perfect! We don't have to tie them or tuck the bags under the lid. We used to have a giant rubber band that kept it in place, now we don't need anything. They fit snugly around the lip of the can and we just walk away. My opinion is that they are worth the added expense to not be frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Hiawhatha

customer_reviews.title: Underrated Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Fitted trash bag liners are super underrated. These are much thicker than the average bag and dont require tying or bundling up the excess bag.
customer_reviews.author: LisaGreg

customer_reviews.title: We actually use our Simple Human garbage can and can liners as a diaper pail in ...
customer_reviews.text: We actually use our Simple Human garbage can and can liners as a diaper pail in our baby's room. I love that these are custom made just for the can. It makes it so much easier to take out and replace. The liners are nice and thick too, so no need to worry about messing spills if the bag breaks like with other products. Just wish they were a little less expensive since we are going through about 1 a day.
customer_reviews.author: Southerngirl

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Sturdy and overall good fit for the Simple Human System
customer_reviews.text: For the most part these trash bags do a good job of simplifying the kitchen. we often have them jam packed by pushing down trash into them and they hold up well. PROS: *sturdyish. knocked a star off because sometimes the elastic rips when you are trying to tighten the back to tie it. Seems like that will be a problem with every trash bag ever. However, it does hold a very heavy weight without having any of them ripped after years of subscribe and save from amazon. *they are obviously tailor made to fit the trash can and they do that effectively. Cons: slightly expensive for just storing trash
customer_reviews.author: A. W

customer_reviews.title: Possible to be in Love with a Trash Can Liner?
customer_reviews.text: Is it possible to love a plastic bag? One for a trash can? Looks like it is! For the last -how many years exactly?- nine years I've been buying these trash can bags. I love their ease of use and that they fit snuggly. There's no showing. There's no tearing apart. There's no hard time opening them. It's easy peasy for a fairly good price. Highly recommended! One thing though, they truly stand out when used with the Simply Human trash cans or any other trashcan for exactly their measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Elke

customer_reviews.title: Never Going Back to Typical Tall Kitchen Bags
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a Tall Kitchen Bag larger than the typical ones you buy at the store because I was tired of the bag being too short and falling into the can after a couple items were placed in the bag. That creates an aggravating dirty mess. These Simple Human Q bags are a perfect fit. The slightly higher cost is worth every penny. I see they are advertised as fitting a certain size Simple Human trash can, but I bought them to fit in my typical-size kitchen trash can, and they work perfectly. These have become my go-to choice.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Great product for SimpleHuman trash bin
customer_reviews.text: The problem I had with these kitchen garbage bags is that I did not know they are specifically shaped for the special side-by-side SimpleHuman garbage pail. We use the stretchy 13 gallon Glad kitchen bags, which Amazon does have, and I since ordered. On the other hand. If you have a deep and narrow garbage pail with the specified measurements in the Amazon description, you will be very pleased with the thickness, scent, and strength of this product. I wish this trash bin was available when I bought my garbage pail a few years ago. Therefore, I suggest you look up the double SimpleHuman garbage pail, buy it and these garbage bags!
customer_reviews.author: lbeck

customer_reviews.title: Such intuitive packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these refills for my simplehuman trash can. I love how it fits perfectly. The bags are made of strong material, it does not rip on me. The bags have a drawstring closure, perfect when it is ready to throw out the trash. I love how simplehuman is very intuitive with their packaging. The box itself has a nice punch out to easily pull out a bag. They also include little notes for when you are running low on bags. That way I know it is time to place another order on Amazon for more trash bags! Super convenient and smart on their part. I recommend buying these trash bag linings from simplehuman, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: They seemed to always slip down and cause for messes but the custom fit trash bags are awesome. Yes
customer_reviews.text: If you own a sinplehuman trash can, these are a must have! Attempting to use regular trash bags meant creating a disaster each time for my family! They seemed to always slip down and cause for messes but the custom fit trash bags are awesome. Yes, they are a bit more expensive, but I love them. My family no longer has any issues with messes created due to slipping bags. The large box is very convient and last several months. The bags are very sturdy, do not leak, and have drawstrings for easy removal.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Broussard

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Pricey, But You Get What You Paid For
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a SimpleHuman stainless steel trash can for our kitchen when we purchased a new house several years ago. This liner is the recommended one for our trash can. Yes, the bags are quite a bit more expensive than the similar-sized ones one can purchase at SAM's, etc, but they hold SO much trash, and they DON'T tear even when crammed full past capacity. I also really like the reminder tags that are placed on the last two or three in each package that alert you that it's time to order new bags. We don't generate that much trash, so a box of 3 refill pack (60 bags) lasts us nearly 9 months. I very much recommend these bags.
customer_reviews.author: BigDave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit - Taking Out the Trash is Easy, Painless, and Mess-Free
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfect for my SimpleHuman trashcan and are truly superior to other bags. I don't have a door to the outside from my kitchen and must carry trash out through the living room crossing my wool rugs, and kids play area. They have never leaked, dripped, or ripped and are such a pleasure to use. I am happy to buy and use these bags which makes an icky and sometimes messy chore as easy, painless, and mess-free as possible.
customer_reviews.author: MemlyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not a great "recyclable liner".
customer_reviews.text: Of course the custom fit bags fit the product, and they do the trick. However, the title of "Recycling Drawstring Trash Bags" implies as expected that these bags are not made of recyclable products and therefore, the bags themselves must be thrown away. Not sure of the point of having a recycling bag/liner, which in of itself, is not recyclable and just creates more trash. I'd rate this product higher if it could be composted or recyclable in nature.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret what might the most expensive trash bags you've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I have two Simple Human trash cans - one in my house and a little one in the camper, which is what these C bags are for. They fit perfectly and I love that even these little guys have a drawstring closure. They don't leak and are pretty sturdy - definitely resistant to tearing. Since the can is so small, we tend to pack it pretty full, and these bags hold up to that abuse. If you are hesitant about spending money on these Simple Human bags and are looking something cheaper - don't. Sometimes you get what you pay for, and this is one of those times!
customer_reviews.author: Gunteacher

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly into the indicated cupboard trash bin
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment, and to save space I bought the cupboard trash bin from Simple Human, and always use the 'R' bags when I replace the liner. These bags have never torn, fit snug, but are not hard to put on, and they pull string has never torn off when closing. I always buy these for the replacement liners and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Great bags. Lazy raccoon proof
customer_reviews.text: The bags are strong and have strong drawstring ties to close them. I had a raccoon try to get into a bag that was out on the curb and he was unable to get inside the bag. He was only able to drag it around the yard. Perhaps my raccoon is well fed by the neighbors trash and needs to try harder. I have a simplehuman trash can that is the best trash can I ever owned. The trash bags fit perfectly. I love the design that allows you to keep the extra bags sleekly hidden in the back of the trash can. The bags packaging is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cameala Freed

customer_reviews.title: Don't like buying them, but they're pretty nice for a garbage bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate having to buy specialized bags for a garbage can. However, this particular garbage can was a gift and it fits nicely in the spot where we need it. So, with all that...I can say that these bags are very heavy duty...much thicker than a standard black garbage bag. The draw strings are an even heavier plastic and I've yet to have a bag or drawstring break or tear. The bags also fit perfectly in the can. So while I don't 'like' having to buy them, at least they are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Agent_CooperTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: It should be called Stupid Human; now you're locked in, overpriced bags; normal ones don't fit
customer_reviews.text: The product might be fine, but this is a good example of giving away the razor to sell the blades. None of the Stupid Human trashcan products easily take a standard sized kitchen bag, or trashcan bag, etc. You become locked into buying these custom products at significant markup and with no freedom of choice among vendors. At least Hefty and Glad have some competition going on to keep each other honest. Stupid Human is a monopoly it seems.... Sorry I bought the can (or actually, the wifey did. Happy wife.... OK, sure)
customer_reviews.author: Jo Gusto

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for great trash can
customer_reviews.text: I buy these trash bags for my simple human step on trash can. They fit the can perfectly. I like that the bag is not visible when the can is closed, however that is due the can design. I have never had one slip into the can or tear even when smashing down to make more room. They are much thicker than normal Kitchen trash bags I have used in the past. Yes, they cost more than the usual kitchen trash bags, but I believe the fit and performance of these bags justifies the higher cost.
customer_reviews.author: Momofsix

customer_reviews.title: They fit! Expensive but fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Ok these are overpriced but I have had the same SimpleHuman trash can for around 15 years. Finally decided to replace it with another SimpleHuman can (much nicer can btw). For all these years I have been making do with Glad tall bags. It has been the same routine for all these years of making the bag fit the plastic insert. It really is nice to have a bag that perfectly fits the can; no fuss no muss. A review for a trash bag; never would have thought...... Now if they could just make them biodegradable.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest source I've found for these bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought a simplehuman trash can because they are well constructed and good quality bags are available that fit it perfectly. For years I paid a premium for small packs of those bags, but it was worth it to have perfect-fitting bags that didn't leak or break and I only felt slightly guilty about paying a premium price. Then I found these packages of 100! Now I am in trash bag Nirvana because I no longer feel that little twinge of guilt each time I put a new bag in the can. I hope you find that too.
customer_reviews.author: Fine Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU ARE IN THE US
customer_reviews.text: This product says it fits an 8 gallon trash can, however - this is a SPECIALTY trash can liner made for a ROUND cylindrical trash can that is measured in Liters. This does not fit the width of a standard 8 gallon waste basket.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: They do not fit the cans that they are recommended for
customer_reviews.text: I have Simple Human trash bins which recommend these bags. They are the same volume as the cans, so its logical that they would be recommended, however the size and shape of the bag is completely different than the size and shape of the can so they don't fit at all. The can is shorter and wider than the taller and narrower bag. Even if I cut them down the side to widen them, they don't fit. So, be careful that just because the volume is the same, and they are recommended, they may not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Marquard

customer_reviews.title: Never had a leaker in 2 years
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. You know when you clean out the fridge and just dump all the liquid etc in them but they still don't leak, I have never had a single one break through and I've been using them solid in a house of 4 people for over 2 years. That's pretty amazing. Also, they fit like a glove. Yes they're a bit on the expensive side but given that you can CRAM them full, I know I'm using less of them (and having to tell my lazy, lazy 14 year old to take out the trash and deal with the grumbling that ensues less often is quite the bonus too).
customer_reviews.author: Angela_GTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Just one bag lasted for two years
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is a little gross to admit but I had one of these trash cans around my house and I would just empty it into a bigger can when it was mostly full. I did this for two years and the bag had no issues. I finally just replaced it. I won’t ever go that long again but wow.. might be a good option for someone looking to reduce their plastic waste. I really could have just washed it out and kept using that same bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelybee

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Pairing with AmazonBasics Round Soft-Close Trash Can - 20L
customer_reviews.text: Amazon: Please strike the SimpleHuman Code D bags to be paired with the purchase of AmazonBasics Round Soft-Close Trash Can - 20L. The Code D bags are too small in diameter for this can. I resorted to using Code J bags we already had, which are a little long but have the correct diameter. I checked SimpleHuman's site and the Code J bags are the closest thing with the correct diameter, so you should switch to pairing Code J bags with new purchases of the AmazonBasics Round Soft-Close Trash Can - 20L (C-10079S-20L).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.C

customer_reviews.title: Cannot fit the rim of trash bin
customer_reviews.text: What they dont tell you is that this trash bag does not fit around the rim of any 7 or 8 Gallon Trash bin. I have 3 trash bins that are 7 gallon but could only find 8 gallons for all bins 7 gallons and up. I was happy to finally found what I needed rather than wasting bigger bags each day, but to my surprise I couldn't get the trash bag to fit even if I stretched it. I searched for bags that would fit a Rubbermaid 2956 trash bin and this product came up as a result. Needless to say I have 0 use for it now.
customer_reviews.author: Wiliam F Conway

customer_reviews.title: Great Price For These
customer_reviews.text: I bought a nice stainless steal trash container for my first home, they require these bags. For sure they work great, fit great but are a little expensive. That being said, I have never had one rip on me in 7 years. Buying a bulk pack like this will get me through awhile but they are expensive. I also tried not using these bags and using cheaper ones which just didn't go so well. I will continue to buy these, though expensive, work great and tie easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jean

customer_reviews.title: Have to buy them if you have the simple human can.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a simple human trashcan a couple of years ago because it locks on top and I thought it would keep my toddler out of the trash. He figured out the trashcan pretty quickly so now I'm just stuck buying trashbags that are too expensive! Amazon has the best price I've found on these bags - the only ones that fit that trashcan. And Amazon delivers them to my home!f It's not a superior trashbag in any way - the top rips sometimes when I take it out. I'm really only buying them because this brand of trashcan is made to ONLY work with their bags.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Durham

customer_reviews.title: Most recent order has been awful
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these trash bags for years. I wanted to put five stars but the most recent order of them have been really awful. I’m not sure what happened but every time we pull the black ties to get the bag out of the trash it rips a hole in the bag. Luckily we aren’t taking our trash far, but if we had to walk a longer distance it would seriously be a problem. We might have to look for a different option that fits this trash can. Really bummed because we loved these for years!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna.Leann

customer_reviews.title: One small problem with a fine product
customer_reviews.text: Great durability, size, and fit. A little pricey but a box of them lasts a long time, so who cares that much. My ONLY discordant note is with an unexpected consequence of the blue color. The drawstring is also blue and it’s difficult to see the two spots where the drawstring appears at the top of the blue bag. I have to search for them: poor me. The white version of the bag has a very visible gray drawstring and doesn’t have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best Fit; Durable
customer_reviews.text: I need this style to fit my garbage can correctly. I can use other trash liners in a pinch but they don't fit as well and you can get a mess on your hands sometimes. I have noticed this style seems to hold a little less than the Hefty trash liners I used to buy, but not enough to be an issue. They are definitely thicker and more durable than the Hefty liners I used to use. I am subscribed to these, so I never run out and I haven't had any delivery issues as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issues Beware
customer_reviews.text: Removing this bag takes the tender touch of angel babies to prevent it from ripping. If you don't have angel babies on demand, prepare to fill it half way, or have to put on gloves, because your going to need to remove trash piece-by -piece and put it into another better quality bag from the big box store. Waste of money, resources and time. Please you sell a higher end trash can at $180, please make bags of quality that match. <3
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: The best trash bags ever. We have a family of 8 and it takes awhile for us to fill these bags. I’m so glad I took a chance on these bags and didn’t settle for the same old trash bags from the grocery store. These ARE worth the hype, plus I use less. I have this on subscribe and save and we don’t use near as many each month as I thought we would. If you’re on the fence, try it! You’ll never go back to regular bags.
customer_reviews.author: shellybelly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new set of trash bags after the member's mark brand that I bought in bulk reduced the size of their bags making them almost too small for my kitchen trashcan. These are great, both in size, and durability. They come on a box that has three packages of bags within it. The packages are almost like those for flushable wipes. They are available as a subscribe and save item so you can set up a delivery schedule that suits your needs. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: So Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about paying so much for garbage bags but believe me its worth it. These bags do not leak, tear and do an excellent job of retaining smelly items without an overpowering scent of febreeze like other name brand bags. Typically my family would fill our regular trash can every other day but with the new can and the stronger bag there is no rush to take anything out. Also when lifting the bags before I would worry about the top lining tearing, not with these. you can lift it out by the top liner and it still won't rip. Definitely worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Tamz39

customer_reviews.title: My world is blue...
customer_reviews.text: fit great and work well, unclear why the cost for the color blue is more than white. Encourage recycling.
customer_reviews.author: JasonPsyD

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the phone holder that went into my CD disk slot which worked great but limited the visibility and access to certain car functions like air conditioning and clock not to mention the CD itself. I got my cup phone holder and I immediately loved it. It is a heavy-duty well-made product and it gave me back my car functions. And the best thing was that it was half the price of the other advertised cup phone holder. I bought 2
customer_reviews.author: Tim  T Brown

customer_reviews.title: Rip easily. Not same as trial packs?!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used and loved the sample pack that came with my new trash can. They fit and were durable. For some reason every bad I've used of about half of my 100 box has ripped easily. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Derek M.

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this trashcan/trashbag system.
customer_reviews.text: I went through a few trash cans before finding the simplehuman trash can that has the lip to lock the bags in place. Then found out that they had their own specific trash bags. At first I thought this was a gimmick to take more of my money but after using it, man it's just beautiful and genius! They work so well together. The bags are solid, never broke on me yet. I like the individual packs that you just shove right into the trash can. well built and designed all around. Worth the extra bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Punn Wiantrakoon

customer_reviews.title: Bags leaked
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I got a bad batch of bags. The last two have leaked in the can. We didn’t discover the leak for a day or two, just enough time for the smell to hit, which was fabulous in our small pantry. Love the can, but hate these bags. They aren’t durable, the seams on the bottom leak, and they are ridiculously expensive. I was willing to pay more for good bags, but these are not good bags.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I never imagined paying more for garbage bags when I thought my Glad or Hefty brand bags were perfectly ok. Then....these. Amazing. They fit the can exactly and appear to hold more . I seem to be using fewer bags and changing them less frequently. Worth every penny, and the convenience of storing them in the can is wonderful. They are thick and sturdy and have never failed to do what they claim to do. So pleased with these bags and the Simple Human garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: The bags fit perfectly in the can and is easy to remove...no suction!
customer_reviews.text: These bags fit perfectly into the Simple Human trash can insert! The Simple Human can with it's easy to remove hard plastic insert has saved me from a lot if pain! Most cans don't have an insert, which means it is very painful for me to remove the bag due to suction. This plastic insert makes it pain free! I also love the design of the can. It looks great in the kitchen! I will never use any other brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Gaia Suzanne Edmiston, Psychic Medium

customer_reviews.title: $27 for trash bags? Yes. A thousand times, yes.
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw the price for these trash bags, I thought the idea of spending $27 on them was nuts. Then I tried them in our new trash can, and I totally understand why people rave about them so much. They fit perfectly and they are incredibly durable. They can handle items that would easily tear a hole in brand name kitchen trash bags, and their capacity is fantastic. So yes, they're expensive, but they're worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: AcornManTop Contributor: Travel Guides & Tips

customer_reviews.title: They are super strong, I find no difference between these and ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT try to use regular bags in your strangely shaped simple human trash can. I ran out of these a few months ago and bought some regular ones. They do NOT fit and will cause more anxiety than its worth! Buy these, that are shaped exactly for your can. They are super strong, I find no difference between these and the glad "force flex" bags. The simple human bags don't flex but they don't tear easily either.
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: bought wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I inadvertently bought the wrong size, but I already opened these and used before I noticed. These bags are such a high quality product that i intend to use anyway, so why return? They are thick which makes them super strong. The size i ended up with are very large and I'm sure will last a very long time. You get what you pay for, but these were not outrageously priced to begin with. well worth my mistake. Already placed another order for the correct size....
customer_reviews.author: jlar

customer_reviews.title: Im Bagging for more!
customer_reviews.text: Like half the Amazon products I buy this went straight to the trash can! One thing I did like about these is they dont leak as much as your typical Walmart brand bags. When you are spinning that 90 lb over stuffed bag around like an Olympic super star in the midst of a hammer throw to get it up in to the tall dumpster all your neighbors can rest assured that their white siding and open windows are safe with these bags! Speaking of over stuffing them I am blown away the National Guard has not discovered these for cheaper alternatives to sand bags during flood season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Convenient packaging
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new Garbage Can and was fooled about the size of the bags.. I thought it was small compared to my old one. ( I just purchased the (Duel recycle/Garbage can. They look small but hold as much or more then regular trash bags. This one has a bag holder in the back so you never have to look for a new bag, and lets you know when you are running out. I use the clear for recycle and regular for trash. I am a Prime member so I love that I can order these and get them the next day.
customer_reviews.author: JOAN E

customer_reviews.title: Thicker, fitter but not at all odor proof.
customer_reviews.text: the Kitchen trash smell is very permeable with simplehuman trash bag. They might fit better and feel thicker, but the trash smell diffused throughout the air within a few hours. I still have to purchase the P or G bags, as I cannot find one that fits 27" simplehuman trash bin. I hope Simplehuman can add some strength to the permeation of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Grace ST

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a trash bin that requires these trash bags. They are specifically made per the brand and honestly, I have never had an issue with these bags. Pop a pouch into the trash can since they have an area to place the whole pouch so all you do is take the tab off and when you pull the used bag out its right there in the trash bin so you can place the new bag. Also i find amazon has the best deal on the price. Bag never rips and contains trash odor.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette

customer_reviews.title: Nice trash bags
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these bags for years - never been disappointed. There's nothing worse than having a trash bag in the container that keeps falling in!! With the band around the top, there is NEVER a problem with that. There is no fragrance to these, so I didn't rate that; otherwise, they're a great item for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Bummer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these bags for almost 6 years now, and the bags used to be very strong and durable. However I would say in the last six months or so these bags are no longer durable and every time I try to pull them out of the garbage can they rip, making it impossible to pull it out easily.
customer_reviews.author: K_mumm

customer_reviews.title: Who reviews trashcan liners... Right?
customer_reviews.text: Who reviews trashcan liners... Right? It's a trashcan liner how different can these be? It's worth my time to give you my two cents. I used to think the same thing until I bought a simply human trash can and then got addicted to the trashcan bags. These bags are really good. For starter they actually fit your trashcan perfectly and so there's no sliding down and material doesn't get into the trashcan itself. Second the material is stronger than most average trash bags that you'll find the grocery store. So you don't have them leaking and pulling apart as removing trash from the house outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jen L Thomas

customer_reviews.title: They hold a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bags. My husband and I like to play a game, who can shove the trash down so the other has to take it out. These bags hold a lot of trash! There is never wasted space in these, we have not encountered the drawstrings ripping or any tears out of the side. They are super durable and all around the best trash bags we have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Erica K

customer_reviews.title: Simple human trash bags!
customer_reviews.text: First, I like the can and the volume of trash it holds. Of course that means that the bags must be sturdy so not easily punctured and next the number of bags in the package are a great deal. And of course I love that I do not have to go stand in line to acquire the bags (you can not find them everywhere). I am also happy that the bags do not have a strong scent. So overall, I love the product and the service.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality trash bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick and sturdy. Fits our simplehuman hanging trash can perfectly. The first bags we tried were a knock off, and while they worked ok, they were very thin and constantly ripped when trying to put a new one onto the can. These are so easy to put in and pull out, BUT they are a little more than twice the cost of the generic ones. I am on the fence whether these are worth the extra price, but ultimately they do what they need to and are a quality trash bag.
customer_reviews.author: Carly B.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Trash. These are legit trash.
customer_reviews.text: I have NO idea what happened with the quality. These are awful. The “tie” literally pulls completely away from The garbage bag, making pulling this out of the trash bin or carrying to the curb- impossible. I am shocked by the quality. What a darn shame.
customer_reviews.author: M Z

customer_reviews.title: No longer durable. Now rips when I lift the bag out of the trash can.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these for our simple human kitchen garbage can for 10 years because they were durable and fit perfectly. They are no longer durable. Now to bag rips when I lift the filled garbage bag. It shocked me at first because I never had that issue with these bags before. Then it kept happening. I am going to save my money and buy something durable even if it’s not the best fit.
customer_reviews.author: gunnerfan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag
customer_reviews.text: What made these bags special and worth the extra cost over generic bags, was how snugly they fit on the trash container insert. Beginning a year ago I suspect the Code G bags were made slightly larger, because customers could have complained that were were too difficult to put on. But while they are now easier to put on initially, they bunch up at the top and can interfere with the lid's return to the closed position. I preferred them the way they were.
customer_reviews.author: myle

customer_reviews.title: Great trash bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are worth the extra price. They fit my Simple Human, 10 gallon (38 L) trash can perfectly. They are strong and can hold more than can fit in the trash can itself. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase and will be buying them again once I run out. Thanks for reading and have a great day!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easy
customer_reviews.text: I gave 2 star for scent as they aren't scented and I think they would benefit from a slight scent or at least the option to purchase scented. I have a baby and diapers make the bin smell (which is to be expected, even know I use diaper bags too). BUT overall I love the bags, they never leak and refills fit comfortably in the back of the bin for easy access when the bag needs changing. Small things to make life easier!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kelly

customer_reviews.title: No more leaking.  I'm in for life.
customer_reviews.text: This system is expensive, but I'm glad my wife purchased this for our RV. We put lots of greases, melon rinds, sea food shells into this system, and unless you open it, you can't smell it. Pull the bag and you see liquid in the bag, but never in the can. I'm paying Superhuman for the rest of my life. Gave the kids the model you talk to for Christmas. Big hit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Snowboater

customer_reviews.title: They fit a standard can Not a Simplehuman Can) better than anything I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they do cost more but it is so worth it to find a bag that actually fits snug in the can. The only kitchen bags I can find locally is 13 gallon. They are always sloppy on the can (Not a Simplehuman can). These take a litttle bit of effort to get on the can but they don't move once in place. We only go through about 2 bags per week if that much. That means this will last us months. The bags are also very thick and durable. it would take a lot of effort to rip one of these. I'm sold and won't be buying any other bags than these going forward
customer_reviews.author: mark pipetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: It sucks that SimpleHuman makes trash cans that won't fit regular trash bags, but I guess it was a smart business move on their part. These bags are super sturdy and just the right size for our SimpleHuman trash can. I just wish they'd use less plastic in the packaging - they packaged these into individual 25 count bags instead of just having a box of 100.
customer_reviews.author: Jsweep

customer_reviews.title: These things are better than any other trash bag out there
customer_reviews.text: I am a cheap person and I would have never bought these but I got a sample with my simple human trash can now I am like the biggest spokesperson for these things Family of seven approved! We use about two to three of these a day and we have to carry our trash to the bins a block and a half away these are the ONLY bags that haven’t ripped or leaked and we have been using them for over a year I get them with the subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: JMMM

customer_reviews.title: Best Garbage Bag on the Market
customer_reviews.text: The bags are sturdy and best of all don't leak. I haven't had a single bag tear or bust, even when putting folded up cardboard in them. They keep smells in, too. I also like the packaging. Each bag is easy to pull out and insert into the can, and when you're getting close to the end it includes a reminder to re-order...which I do. Keeps your garbage out of sight and out of mind. I've been using these for about a year now and I won't even consider a different bag. Great product! Worth a five-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: Are they really for recycling or just blue in color?
customer_reviews.text: The biggest disappointment is they don't have the recycle symbol on them. So, I'm not sure if they are just blue bags or can I toss them in with my regular recycling. Nothing on the box, and nothing on the bag indicates recyclable
customer_reviews.author: Ted Cecil

customer_reviews.title: No lost or wasted bags
customer_reviews.text: I love that these liners fit perfectly in my trash can. With others, they slid down and I would have to dig through trash to find the top, or they would bunch up and when I took the bag out it would only be about 2/3 full making me feel like I was wasting bags. These are great. Used to be able to buy them at Lowe's (where I bought the trash can) but they don't carry them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty... Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing garbage bags (and cans) that are so pricey.. but when you use these you understand why they are fantastic. We went from a regular can with glad force flex bags to this and I was amazed. These bags are high quality thick trash bags and NEVER rip or tear no matter how much we stuff them. Glad changed their quality so we decided to try something new.. Now we own multiple Simplehuman trash cans and love the quality and thickness of these bags. Large bags fit 2 regular size bags of trash inside of one! You will not regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G.

customer_reviews.title: Great trash bags!
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than most other trash bags, so it does not tear. Keeps smells in the bag not permeating through your kitchen. I like this bag size as my trash can is smaller. Easier to carry to trash can outside or to the dumpster. Easy to pull out a new bag from each of the 25 bag package. I purchased a 100 count box, but they come in 25 count packages in the box. Much better for smaller storage areas.
customer_reviews.author: Tibrms

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags but found cheaper option at grocery store
customer_reviews.text: The bags are nice however I have found a much cheaper option that is the exact same size at the grocery store. Also these don’t have a scent to them, the ones I found do have a wide variety of scents. These bags are nice and durable and I never had one rip or tear. I just found some that are less expensive
customer_reviews.author: Annoying

customer_reviews.title: Expensive...for that they are...but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: It's crazy to spend this much on bags (and a garbage can), but I cannot recommend these enough. I'm a general fan of ForceFlex bags, but I have to say, these are better! They fit perfectly in the can and after nearly 100 bags, we've probably only had one rip, in total! Just unreal! I cannot recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Super Durable Trash Bag
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these bags for more than 6 years. I'll never use another trash bag. The durability is beyond compare. I've only had a bag burst on me one time and that was because I truly tested the limits and should have known better. Occasionally the draw string will break, but again it occurs when I seriously overfilled the bag. They do not break and they do not leak. They're well with the expense. And the price on Amazon for 100 bags is a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is our first refill pack since receiving our trash can a little over a year ago as a gift (and also came with a bunch of bags initially). We’ve gone a month and a half without the simplehuman bags and have just been using normal bags, and I’m definitely glad to have these back 😅. Our other bags ripped and wouldn’t come out of the trash can, and my favorite part is that they extras fit in the trash can. Makes things so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best price and quality is unreal!
customer_reviews.text: This fits right into the back of the simple human waste can. I can't even believe Im writing a review on this but it's that good. Simplehuman trash cans and the kitchen trash bags make life a little more simple and makes the dirty job that much easier to take care of. Totally recommend this because the price is excellent... hard to believe its custom fit for this price.
customer_reviews.author: G-I Jane

customer_reviews.title: The perfect kitchen garbage bag. Made to fit exactly the  Simple Human garbage bin.
customer_reviews.text: May be a bit more expensive than competing bags BUT, a big BUT. These Simple Human bags fit PERFECTLY and can hold an incredible weight of even wet garbage. I'm an old guy and these are the best bags I've ever used. Any other brand of bag does NOT compare at all. Simple Human are the Ferrari of garbage bags. Will never buy any other.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but good.
customer_reviews.text: These really are the best trash bags. I was hestitant about paying this much for trash bags, but I've ultimately been converted over to the "fancy" bags. I'll still cheat with some large Glad bags here & there, but breaking the price down to per bag, these aren't really much more than the large decent store bought ones & these are soooo much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Worth the little extra
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are more expensive than typical bags. However I have yet to have one break and they are the perfect fit for the trashcan they are designed for. SimpleHuman cans are expensive, and the bags are custom, but as a system they work well together. My dogs have yet to get into this particular trashcan/bag combination.
customer_reviews.author: C Gohman

customer_reviews.title: Roaches Welcome
customer_reviews.text: What is the point of having a lid on a trash can? One of the reasons is to protect from invaders. Big AND small. Sounds simple. But not simple enough for “Simple Human!” The lid has a big gap for cockroaches to enter. The can itself has several openings as well. Waste of money. Going back to a regular cheap trash can with a lid that is not just for show. Will try to mitigate my damages by using this one as a laundry hamper. That’s all it’s good for.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: I love these bags there very steardy.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the delivery guy, he put my complete order right behind my front door, so when I got ready to go to work that next morning at 5am, I could opened the front door not know why not, so I went and work up my husband who just went to sleep after working the night shift had to go out the back door to go around to the front to see what was the problem, so all the things that I ordered was piled right up behind the door, this never happened to me before, I was very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Demeteris Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion if you paid the $200 for the trash can you may as well get the good bags. They are good. I'd say that maybe an additional inch in length would be helpful as we like to fill these expensive things up to the top & by that point they usually fall in on us. They are very sturdy but a sharp edge will do the trick in creating a rip every now & then.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Bags that work well
customer_reviews.text: These bags fit and work perfectly...with the can that they're meant for. Which is both the strength and the weakness of the design. The bags are a little small for a primary receptacle, but they still work. These bags are more expensive than other trash bags, but they fit so perfectly in the simplehuman cans that it almost doesn't matter. One of the things that's nice is that at the very end of the bags, they have stickers to remind you to order more. It's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan F.

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Trash Bags
customer_reviews.text: With my state (CA) forcing me to purchase my formerly free trash bags from the grocery stores, I was forced to buy a simple human trash can. Little did I know that having a fancy trash can meant having fancy trash bags (kinda like buying a BMW and realizing it only takes premium gas). HOWEVER. These trash bags FIT in the trashcan! What a concept. I had to struggle before with grocery store bags falling to the bottom of a can too big, but no more! These trash bags saved me a lot of sanity at the simple cost of expensive as heck trash bags.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Joel Chan

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to buy the Simple Human bags instead of the other bags sold in the grocery store due to those bags are slightly smaller in width and would have to be stretched more to fit over the canister. The Simple Human bags do not require any additional tugging to fit the trash canister. I've never had a bag tear either.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A j-type Trash Bag You Can Rely on.
customer_reviews.text: I have a circular 40L trash bin in my kitchen and I've been using the SImplehuman J-type trash bags in it for several years. They fit inside the can extremely well and never leak. They have a drawstring closure you can use when they are full. A great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey S. Trop

customer_reviews.title: Luxury garbage bags
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would spend money on bags like these. We inherited a trash can that these fit. If you have the money to spend on these, it's worth it. They fit nicely and are good quality. The packaging keeps them nice and tidy and easy to grab a fresh bag. This last package we received might have defective bags. They still work fine but the seam at the top is not nice and neat as I remember.
customer_reviews.author: Trucker G

customer_reviews.title: Value-add product
customer_reviews.text: When we bought the trash can that these are designed for, we went ahead and bought extra bags, too. I love the convenience of having them tucked behind the back of the trash can. I also really love that about halfway (or so) through the bags, there’s a reminder that you’re getting low. If we didn’t have the surplus of bags already, that would have been my cue to order more. Life’s busy; the reminder is an added touch that I truly appreciate!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Marsh

product_meta.title: simplehuman Custom Fit Drawstring Trash Bags, 60 Pack, White, 60 Pack
product_meta.description:
Size:60 Pack| Style:Code Rsimplehuman custom fit can liners are designed to fit our cans perfectly, so the bag stays completely hidden when the lid is closed. The custom fit also means the liner fits tightly around the inner bucket and won't slip into the trash. Available in a range of sizes, these liners are made from extra durable plastic with thick double seams to prevent rips and tears and convenient drawstring handles so they are easy to lift, tie and carry.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: Custom Fit Liners: simplehuman liners are tailored to perfectly fit simplehuman cans so they don't slip and the bag stays completely hidden when the lid is closed
Thick double seams: Extra durable plastic and thick double seams prevent rips and tears
Convenient drawstring handles are easy to lift, tie and carry

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars28,550 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
